00011 void bufInit( struct Buffer* buffer  )
00012 {       
00013         buffer->line = -1;
00014         buffer->rLine = 16;
00015         buffer->data = malloc( buffer->rLine * sizeof( struct DString ) );
00016         for ( int i = 0; i < buffer->rLine; ++i ) {
00017                 buffer->data[i] = dstInitCString( "" );
00018         }
00019         
00020         bufNewline( buffer );
00021 }
00022 
00023 
00024 void bufDel( struct Buffer* buffer )
00025 {
00026         if ( !buffer->data )
00027                 return;
00028         
00029         for ( int i = 0; i < buffer->rLine; ++i ) {
00030                 dstDel( buffer->data[i] );
00031         }
00032         
00033         free( buffer->data );
00034         buffer->data = 0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 void bufReset( struct Buffer* buffer )
00039 {
00040         if ( !buffer->data )
00041                 return;
00042         
00043         /* TODO dont do this :( */
00044         bufDel( buffer );
00045         bufInit( buffer );
00046         return;
00047         
00048         for ( int i = 0; i < buffer->rLine; ++i ) {
00049                 dstReset( buffer->data[i] );
00050 //              free ( buffer->data[i] );
00051         }
00052         
00053         buffer->line = -1;
00054         bufNewline( buffer );
00055 }

00058 void bufWrite( struct Buffer* buffer, char* text, int size )
00059 {
00060 //      printf("Write buffer \n");
00061 //      int oldSize = buffer->size;
00062 //      int lastFound = 0, lastBR = -2;
00063                 
00064         text[size] = 0;
00065         struct DString* nstr = dstInitCString2( text );
00066         
00067         char* tok;
00068         while ( (tok = dstTok2( nstr, "\r\n" )) ) {
00069                 dstAppendCString( buffer->data[buffer->line], tok );
00070 
00071                 if ( !nstr->isLastTok ) {
00072                         bufNewline( buffer );
00073                 }
00074         }
00075         
00076         dstDel( nstr );
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 int bufNewline( struct Buffer* buffer )
00081 {
00082 //      int oldSize = buffer->size;
00083         
00084         buffer->line++;
00085         buffer->size = 0;
00086         buffer->rSize = 128;
00087         
00088         if ( buffer->line >= buffer->rLine ) {
00089                 int oldR = buffer->rLine;
00090                 buffer->rLine *= 2;
00091                 
00092                 buffer->data = realloc( buffer->data, ( buffer->rLine + 1 ) * sizeof( struct DString* ) );
00093                 for( int i = oldR; i < buffer->rLine; ++oldR ) {
00094                         buffer->data[i] = NULL;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097 
00098                         
00099         return 0;
00100 }
